org.seasar.portlet.wrapper
クラス HttpServletRequestWrapper

java.lang.Object
  org.seasar.portlet.wrapper.HttpServletRequestWrapper
すべての実装されたインタフェース:
javax.portlet.PortletRequest, javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest, javax.servlet.ServletRequest
public class HttpServletRequestWrapper
extends java.lang.Object
implements javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest, javax.portlet.PortletRequest

This class is a dummy HttpServletRequest.

作成者:
Shinsuke Sugaya
